content.p: This tab enables you to add a custom message to the User Note screen. The Insight Display automatically navigates to the User Note screen if the default User Note has been replaced with a custom User Note and there are no Alerts. If there are Alerts, then the Insight Display navigates to the Health Summary screen. The Insight Display hibernates after 3 to 4 minutes of inactivity even though the User Note screen is active and it will not be visible after the screen blanks.

td.p: 0 to 25 characters including all printable characters except the single quote (') and the double quote ("). The ~ and ^ characters are reserved.
Text to be displayed on the Insight Display User Note screen. One or all lines can be blank.

content.p: Click Default to restore the original User Note.
Click View User Note to display the current User Note screen.
Click Apply to add a custom User Note.
